mapper.insert: insert into member values( memberSq.nextval, #{name}, #{id}, #{pwd}, #{birthDate}, sysdate, #{gender}, #{email}, #{tel}, default, default )
mapper.select: select count(id) from member where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update member set state='Y',joinDate=sysdate where memberIdx=#{memberIdx}
mapper.select: select m.*, g.gradeName from member m , grade g where memberGradeIdx=gradeIdx order by memberIdx desc
select m.*, g.gradeName from member m, grade g where memberGradeIdx=gradeIdx and state='Y' order by memberIdx desc
select m.*, g.gradeName from member m , grade g where memberGradeIdx=gradeIdx and memberIdx=#{memberIdx}
mapper.update: update member set email=#{email}, tel=#{tel} where memberIdx=#{memberIdx}
